website_summaries.verdict: This device is good for those who are reluctant to use a blade remover on their feet. Buyers should keep all paperwork for a while - in case the motor or driver fails on the unit.
pros: Is corded so it doesn't need recharging and doesn't require much pressure to remove even tough calluses
cons: The driver has failed on some units, and the company's customer service was not helpful

customer_reviews.title: Another P.O.S. made in China. Never turned on!
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed a powerful one of these stat, as my old battery powered one has been "dying" lately and my feet have been getting worse. Eagerly looked forward to this arriving after all the research I did. I excitedly tore open the packaging, plugged it in, and... nothing. Talk about an anti climax. Completely dead. I tried different plugs in n my home, I read the directions, and its just "dead on arrival." I'm sorry, but is it so hard to have some quality control standards in China?!? Their reputation for crappy JUNK didn't develop for no reason!!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Torque!
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I bought what was called the most powerful callus shaver, and its torque was awfully weak  so I was reluctant to try another very similar appearing device. That one finally died, it did last 3 years, so I bought this one. Wow what an improvement. This really does the job. Under normal usage you never overwhelm the motor. It just keeps grinding. I'm a big guy with big feet and dont get to the pedicurist nearly often enough so my calluses are pretty heavy, and this is doing a great job. I wont post pics because eww,,, but they are similar to other pictures shown :) 5 stars, this is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kuenster

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: My review is for the “Emjoi Micro-Pedi 3D POWER Callus Remover with Xtreme Coarse Soft & Flexible Roller (Most Powerful & Corded)” This little tool does a great job smoothing off your rough callused feet and hands. You don’t need to press hard to get results. I pay for monthly pedi’s but still get dry cracked heels in between appointments. No worries now, 5-6 minutes once a week and my feet and fingers are smooth and soft again. I like to follow this up by applying Bag Balm and wearing socks overnight to help moisturize my skin. Would have been nice to get at least 1 refill with this kit but hoping the one included will last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: L Warner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Mico-Pedi for my wife after seeing it on one of the home shopping shows. when I researched it on amazon, I took the recommendations from others to purchase the corded version over the battery operated one. It seemed to be the right choice because there is not loss of power that others have stated from the battery version. When it arrived my whole family decided to give it a shot and it does work great. Dead skin comes off easily leaving your feet very smooth. If you clean the rollers they will last a good while before replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: plasticpipe

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble with dry scaly feet with hard callouses. Sometimes I would even cut them off. This product is fast and easy and I won't ever have to cut again. I highly recommend it and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: weedshasta

customer_reviews.title: Finally, this is The One!
customer_reviews.text: I h-a-t-e having callused feet — and unfortunately, I build calluses very quickly. I've tried everything: shavers (scary, only useful for the side-of-big-toe callus), rasps (rough results, can be painful), stones/polishers (only good for finishing up after the shaver or rasp), and the battery-powered Pedi Perfect roller (an underpowered letdown). Nothing did the job I wanted... until the Micro-Pedi! It's fast and easy and my feet have never been this smooth. Love that it's corded so it doesn't lose power. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Duca

customer_reviews.title: No what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: What is pictured here is not what came in the mail. The picture appears blue and corded, what came in the mail is black and cord is not attached. Has anyone else received different then pictured?
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had the battery operated one from the same company and this plug in unit blows the other right out of the water. Price point was great. The girl who does my services was so impressed she got one for herself!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves this! Easy to use and works!
customer_reviews.text: I have the cordless and got this one for my dad and I’m glad I did bc he prefers it over the rechargeable cordless one I have. The bigger range you get is convenient for sure. All emoji parts fit on all the emoji machines this one doesn’t come with anything extra like the cuticle kit so order the different attachments that you want. I use all the different coarsenesses of files for different areas. Best pedi device! I can’t imagine not having one
customer_reviews.author: cierra

customer_reviews.title: Great for frequent, thick calluses.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I ever used for thick callus build-up on my foot. I like the Emjoi Nano version (electric not battery), which is smaller but uses the same rollers, and I gave it a 5 star rating when I was using that one, but this one seems more powerful and does the job a little quicker. Both are excellent but I really love this one. I tried some rechargeable battery models previously but they run out of power before I am finished.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H.

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Used this product 2 times and its already dead!! I thought maybe it was outlet but nope, it will not work. The power is not all what it should be. It says its better because its electric driven, i don't have rough feet but this machine is very weak for it to be ran plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Not sure

customer_reviews.title: YES SO WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness!!!!! I have had their battery operated one for years and ordered some of the blue rollers for it not long ago but I wear flip flops almost year round and my toes and heels are horrendous because of that!! While the blue rollers did work, this one for calluses is so so so much better!!!! I can even put my little bit smoother blue rollers in it for maintenance every other day or so! Definitely worth the money especsince less than one pedicure!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Brady

customer_reviews.title: So Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Originally we purchased the battery operated units and they are fine but this one OMG it is so powerful. Takes 1/4 the time to do the same amount of polishing/buffing your feet. Incredible the difference between this corded model and the battery operated one. They are the same in every other way in the size and how it is used, etc. but what a difference in power!
customer_reviews.author: SafetyCanary

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Have problem with a callus on the bottom of my toe due to a joint fusion that changed the shape of my foot, which of course changes where my foot hits when I walk. Have tried several scrubs with no results. This thing works great. I had always thought these would hurt but it doesn't. Can't feel it. I do as the instructions stated and only keep it on a couple of seconds at a time.
customer_reviews.author: SGYoung

customer_reviews.title: Corded version is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on youtube via Miss Crazy Tammy. It really works!!! My feet are very smooth. It takes about 10-15 minutes to remove all the dead skin and callous from my feet. I use it once a week to keep my feet pretty. We all must keep our feet pretty for summer sandals. I bought the corded version because I did not want to deal with batteries. I think the corded version is likely stronger than the battery version. Very easy to pop the rollers in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different products to get rid of calluses on my feet. This is the one that works! Easy to use and it being corded means it doesnt power down on the tougher ones
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: LOVING THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot so my heels callous quickly and thickly. I purchased a battery-powered Emjoi Callus Remover and fell in love. I use it a couple times a week so running out of batteries is not an option. So I purchased this plug-in and keep the battery-powered one as a back-up. Perfect plan (for me). I also appreciate how this little gadget saves time (and embarrassment) during pedicures since I get to pre-treat my heels BEFORE my appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty satisfied with this product. Does better than any pedicure in a fraction of the time. Gentle, but effective. I wish I could get rid of the deep cracked lines, but nothing has touched those. Overall, very worth the money! Photo shown was after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on June 14 and it stopped working on October 25. Are they meant to last only a few months? If so this is not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy my Emjoi!
customer_reviews.text: I heard good things about Emjoi from several people who bought another model that works with batteries. Since I'm not a big fan of dealing with batteries, I decided to try this power operated model. I absolutely love it! Wish I had it years ago. I stand on my feet all day and nothing worked as well as this little machine. Finally don't have to worry about my dry and cracked heels that felt awful. Every woman and man should have one. Much better, easier, safer and cheaper than professional pedicures.Since I tried it on myself, it's a great gift idea too!.
customer_reviews.author: Ilena

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Throw out those chargeable battery-operated ones. This thing is amazing. Absolutely amazing.-No BS. This thing is a workhorse and won't let you down. I've gone through 10 rollers.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT MITCHELL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I use it every 2 weeks to clean the calluses on my heels. So much easier and more effective than a pumice stone or file. And one pumice wheel has lasted 6 months and still works well. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Seavers

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used only twice then it stopped working. I tried to turn in on and nothing happens. Was not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, used item sold
customer_reviews.text: A used item without the charger was sent to me! Stay away from scammers. Low quality product
customer_reviews.author: Karla C.

customer_reviews.title: Emoji callus remover
customer_reviews.text: A great product. I used this right away when it arrived and it is a great tool for removing callus. Easy to clean and change heads on. Good value and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hammercl

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it. It delivers what it claims
customer_reviews.text: I have received Emjoi Micro-Pedi Power today (on time). The package was perfect. I tried and, I honestly think this is a great product. Totally worth it. Also is powerful but light, very comfortable to use and definitely not noisy.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet...
customer_reviews.text: This is my seventh Emjoi Micro-Pedi. My kids keep taking them! Due to no batteries, this is the best one yet. I keep this one hidden. It takes a little time to get baby soft feet, but it's worth it! I tried other versions from other companies, but had to come back to Emjoi.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: this thing really works! My heals were rough but now they are smooth. I love that it is electric and not battery powered because it gives it lots of rotational speed and power. One reviewer said it stops spinning with this slightest pressure. Um, no it doesn't. In fact if you are not careful you could press hard enough to hurt your skin. I am glad they didn't put annoying protections in. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Hurla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that does the job nice and I don't have to work hard moving my arms back and forth. It is amazing how my heals feel after I use this. I initially bought the other shape corded one but returned because I like the way this one feels better. I had tried from a friend but bought the other one because it was cheaper, but I believe it is worth paying the extra cash for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Love both, this for portability but the electric seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the electric corded. Love both, this for portability but the electric seems to have a bit more guts. Always get the coarsest rollers .
customer_reviews.author: lIZ MARKUS

customer_reviews.title: No mor batteries!
customer_reviews.text: I have the battery powered units, but this is infinitely better. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It does a great job,is lightweight,and compact .
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Maybe try another brand
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until one day it completely stopped working! I owned a battery one that did the same thing. I thought this one would be more worth it. The rollers also don't last long and I only bought the emjoi brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest tool ever
customer_reviews.text: This is so worth the money spent. I have very dry heels from walking around barefoot in my home and the pedi fixes my feet all up.. Amazon seems to be selling for a much lower price then other sellers so my advice to anyone needing one is to get it while you can. I tell you this because they were no longer available for a few months and I had to wait... so don't hesitate. Also the best thing too about the pedi is that its power operated and never loses power. this for me is the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but the angle of the roller holder makes it harder to use than other callus removers.
customer_reviews.text: The shape of the roller holder (head) is at an odd angle and makes it hard to use. I wish it was open on all sides like most other callus removers. That being said, if you hold it just right, it works fine. The fact that it's not battery powered is a huge plus, but I wish it had more than one speed (faster).
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. So glad it is electric instead of battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Bevy

customer_reviews.title: GOOD HOME CARE FOR MY CALLUSES!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT YOU CAN USE AT HOME TO KEEP YOUR CALLUSES UNDER CONTROL--CAN'T SAY ENOUGH GOOD THINGS ABOUT IT--IT REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: banker

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok but not  a miracle tool by any means
customer_reviews.text: I would probably recommend just buying a hand tool. It works but it doesn't produce any king of phenomenal results. I think the rollers run out fast. I've used it about 4 times and it seems like the roller already needs replaced. I'll probably just got back to using a hand tool rather than ordering replacements since there isn't much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This is IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that I could have purchased for myself... My feet are singing happy melodies...I thought to myself..Ooh this is probably going to be another useless product that I am going to have to send back...I used the Micro Pedi and instantly fell in Love with it .. less time consuming...less effort ... less sweat..I found a true friend...Thanks Emjoi!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Finally electrical!!! My battery operated one was always requiring new batteries
customer_reviews.author: anaelvia sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. My feet were so calloused
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My feet were so calloused, I swear I was walking on a 1/4" bed of hard, dry, cracked, dead skin. My feet were so rough, I swore that my feet would instead remove the grit from the sanding cylinders. It took over an hour plus per foot, but when I was done, my heals, the balls of my feet, everything...were smoother than a baby's ass. I almost feel human.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tool, it works amazing, it has good powers and it easy to use, plug it in and ready to go, best price online, I will highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: The BEST device out there for removing callouses and rough skin ...
customer_reviews.text: The BEST device out there for removing callouses and rough skin from your feet. Much, much better than the battery operated model. Gives more power consistently through the whole process. Never had such smooth feet!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my feet
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this works to soften my callus feet!
customer_reviews.author: healthy baby

customer_reviews.title: nice little micro pedi tool
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact. I bought it for a gift. Hope it works as well as it is advertised to do. If it does, it will be well worth it.It's the day after Valentines Day and I have to tell you, this product is all and more that it was advertised to be. It's quick, efficient and so easy to use. I am going to order replacement rollers right now so I will never be without it. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma N

customer_reviews.title: This little baby is one of the best products out there
customer_reviews.text: This little baby is one of the best products out there. This has the power to really take care of your feet without the damage you could sustain from some other products on the market. I use this every night and my feet remain soft, no calluses or dry cracked skin. I highly reccomend this product for anyone with either of these issues with their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ona

customer_reviews.title: my wife is pleased, I don’t rip our 600 thread count bed ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this item for 6 months. I don’t have to worry about losing power. Now I can put my socks on without snagging. Also, my wife is pleased, I don’t rip our 600 thread count bed sheets. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Emjoi
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this product, it works way better than the amope. You dont have to constantly buy batteries for it. Its very powerful and removes the dead skin and calluses quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Impressed although plug could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I had the battery operated version and didn't know what I was missing until I got the one with the power cord. What a big difference! It removes dry skin so much quicker. My only complaint is that the plug is not very secure where it attaches to the machine and at least once when I use it I have to plug it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely wonderful. Really gets rid of callouses in matter of a few swipes. Glad they came out with the corded variety since you never know when batteries are going to run out. You won't be disappointed in this product, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Retunia

customer_reviews.title: Works well, a good product
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves this. Has had the battery operated one for a while but this one “is much better” . Has power which is steady and even. Love, love her smooth, silky feet
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramji

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and works well. Spent quarter of an hour and did both my rough feet. Will need some replacement heads Great product
customer_reviews.author: Harry D

customer_reviews.title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi Power Callus Remover
customer_reviews.text: My feet were not terribly bad; this does remove dry skin, but not as perfectly as shown in the photo. I used another product that you soak your feet in that took off the most dead skin, and use this as preventative for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: sherri in Fl

customer_reviews.title: I love this. This is my second purchase of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. This is my second purchase of the Emjoi. (I gave my old one to my Mom.) Though I'm not sure that this is anymore powerful than the corded version it replaces. I do prefer the shape of this one over the shape of the old one. I think this one is probably more ergonomical.
customer_reviews.author: Rocquael

customer_reviews.title: It worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It worked better than expected. My wife was skeptical, but after doing just one of her heels, it was clear to her that this device is a dream come true! One tip, spend the extra money to get the Corded Model, the battery powered one probably would only be good for light-duty "touch ups".
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased, but I only have kept one...the rest are for gifts. I think this is one of the all time best personal foot grooming products on the market. EMJOI Micro-Pedi is easy to use, and does a better job since it has a battery, rather than rubbing by hand. It is great you can replace the roller as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Zmom

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be awesome.....
customer_reviews.text: Just received, used once. 5 stars. Very powerful. Rechargeable. If it doesn’t hold up I’ll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Robertson

customer_reviews.title: DOES A GREAT JOB. WOULD BUY
customer_reviews.text: REALLY WORKS WELL. PLENTY OF POWER. DOES A GREAT JOB. WOULD BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works good except plug keeps pulling out. Not sure it is more powerful than the battery operated one? I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Herm

customer_reviews.title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Leaves your feet so nice and smooth. So impressed that I purchased one for my daughter. Easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: HB Nan

customer_reviews.title: It is ok.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but a a detail sander works much better and costs about the same. And detail replacement sand paper is much much cheaper and lasts a lot longer. But then I am a guy and am not into dainty things.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Bunker

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying it...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would not work but got surprised....it works fine and really smotthed out the skin in my feet...yes, it wouldn't become as if you go to a specialist but it is something you can do at home, at your own time...it definetely works.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Blunk

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I've used it almost every day since it arrived. It's especially nice for the callous on the side of the big toe. I'll be ordering the coarser rollers for the heels. I've only had couple salon pedicures because I don't like the way it feels, and with this you feel nothing. And I can do it at my convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I love this device
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! I've been struggling with my calluses on my heels for ever, and purchased many other tools before, but this is the best! It took me a while to achieve the desired result when I used it for the first time, but me heels looked awesome. To maintain the smoothness, the second time around was easy. I highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: V_WhiteSLC

customer_reviews.title: Buy, buy, buy. It works great
customer_reviews.text: So very easy to use. Works great have bought another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: lori walters

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have heavy Calloused feet and this tool is the best Ivr I've ever tried! I liked it so much I bought one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnne

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty useless. You will spend a lot of time ...
customer_reviews.text: DON'T. Not enough power... it's pretty useless. You will spend a lot of time hoping it will get through the callouses... and then not ever get the results you want. I even spent extra money to purchase some of the 'extreme' course refills. didn't change a thing... still no good. works more like a gentle buffer than a callous remover. I've done better with the foot files you can find in the dollar store. There has to be a better way.
customer_reviews.author: Just meTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the corded version, but the seller sent me the battery operated one. I kept it, and I love it! It works fast and well. I ordered the extra tough refills to go with it. I am pleased with the results I get and am recommending it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: miss dude

customer_reviews.title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi Power-WOW
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts but this little unit works like a charm. Plenty of power and works like a belt sander for my feet. My only complaint (at this point), is that I wish the rollers were a little bigger so as to have better contact with more of the foot. The "green" extra course rollers are a must !! As of right now, pretty pleased with this product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MtnBandit

customer_reviews.title: Working but not as well as my wife had hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Working but not as well as my wife had hoped. Not quite able to get all of the dead skin off of her feet. She does have moderately dry heels (we may just need to invest in a grinder).
customer_reviews.author: gmdenali

customer_reviews.title: ... the battery operated version of this and was so happy to find the corded version
customer_reviews.text: I had the battery operated version of this and was so happy to find the corded version. I bought this about a year ago, and it is still running perfectly. One of the best inventions ever for those of us who fight tough callus's on our feet.
customer_reviews.author: gem2456

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. It works great and is so fast at smoothing over the rough places on my feet. I am looking forward to enjoying this product in the coming months.
customer_reviews.author: sewmac

customer_reviews.title: unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Use 1 time and stopped working they were to pay my return shipping which they did not new one is working better have used it twice cost me $10.+ to get new one so keep this in mind if you buy one
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES A. HILL

customer_reviews.title: Plug in unit is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is now electric! I had the battery operated unit before and it was ok but this new plug in had better power and does the job much better!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Finally someone got it right! I have used everything you can think of to try to keep my feet smooth. Now that summer is near I will use this even more, it is so easy! A good product!
customer_reviews.author: john  kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Best callus remover for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: Noting words any better than this callus remove. They are gone in no time and make you feet so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. strite

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works really well. Have purchased others for gifts
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my wife and she loves it. She has never owned a product such as this. Thank you so much for making her happy:)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: awesome emjoi pedi 😎
customer_reviews.text: This pedi is amazing I love it, my feet stay so soft and its great for stubborn calluses . It was a great purchase, so happy I purchased this cause I was going back and forth with a few other expensive one's and finally decided on this and it is better then I thought!!
customer_reviews.author: honeymee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Would highly recommend!! My feet always get so rough after I have been at the beach. They scratch the sheets and feel terrible! Then I purchased this product and use regularly. Feet are extremely soft now.
customer_reviews.author: Suki O

customer_reviews.title: So glad this was given to me as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: So glad this was given to me as a Christmas gift, works great and has helped me improve my heals. I probably use it once every 2 weeks just to keep them smooth.
customer_reviews.author: C LeMaster

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have the battery one and this is a great product. This one I believe works better than the battery operated one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: Works so good and I like it doesn't take batteries. I have saved so much not having to have . pedicures so often
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hannagan

customer_reviews.title: Love the Emjoi Callus Remover
customer_reviews.text: This product works better than anything I have ever used in the past. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a convenient and easy way to keep calluses from feet
customer_reviews.text: Such a convenient and easy way to keep calluses from feet. I would prefer if the roller were farther from the case so that it would reach harder to get to areas of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Pudge

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet were so rough that I would scratch myself in my sleep when they would accidentally rub against each other. The very first time I used this product my feet were so smooth and soft. I showed it to my sister-in-law, told her how pleased I was with it, and she immediately ordered herself one.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita K. Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Best foot tool I've every bought!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend received one of these for Christmas and let me try it. I Had to Have One!!! And I bought a couple as gifts as well. Works like a charm, lots of power, extra replacement wheel inclulded. Never has getting smooth feet (painlessly) been easier. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Penton Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very slow product. It stops when I press it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very slow product. It stops when I press it against my feet. For this price, i expected something that has more torque.
customer_reviews.author: RetireNavy

customer_reviews.title: the best purchase I've made at Amazon (and I've made quite ...
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best purchase I've made at Amazon (and I've made quite a few...)! This does EXACTLY what it says it does - and works far better than I'd anticipated. This is my favourite gadget...possibly ever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The real deal here. Tried battery types and they all broke and had lesser power!
customer_reviews.author: greenlionplanck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Harder to use since I have to plug it in but still does a spectacular job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: She likes it! She had been using sandpaper and a scrub brush type device, this is much nicer and easier on her heals and gives her the heals that she is looking for.
customer_reviews.author: George Ross

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews of both the battery operated one ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of both the battery operated one and this, and when I needed to get a new one, I chose this because my feet/heels have become quite callused as I age.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cordless one first. Nice, but was constantly replacing batteries. Save yourself the trouble and spring for the corded one.
customer_reviews.author: ZiggyM

customer_reviews.title: Super new Micro-Pedi
customer_reviews.text: Love the lastest Micro-Pedi. I had the cordless version, but felt I was replacing batteries too often. This new version has a cord but is completely reliable and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree La Puma-Watson, Author

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER MADE!
customer_reviews.text: BEST PRODUCT EVER MADE! NO NEED TO PAY PEOPLE FOR PEDICURE'S ANYMORE WHEN YOU CAN DO YOUR ON IN JUST A FEW MINUTES WITH THIS PRODUCT. IT IS EXCELLENT! BEST INVESTMENT I'VE EVER MADE. HIGH QUALITY TOO.
customer_reviews.author: UK FAN

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic, it really does work
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic, it really does work. Makes my heels which are normally so rough I could cut glass feel super smooth. I love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Raspberry Wren

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job, have to hold it longer against the ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, have to hold it longer against the foot to get all but does a really good job.
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! The only reason I gave it 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! The only reason I gave it 4 of 5 stars is because if your feet are really rough like mind get, then you need to purchase the extreme coarse rollers as this unit comes with rollers that are good but not quite tough enough!
customer_reviews.author: Momof6

customer_reviews.title: This is the best one to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one to buy. I had the battery powered one but doesn't seem to have the power of the electric. Even my podiatrist said to continue using it for my callouses. So I have the battery one to my sister and said if she liked that one, then buy the electric Emjoi Micro-Pedi Power.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gunter

product_meta.title: Emjoi Micro-Pedi 3D POWER Callus Remover with Xtreme Coarse Soft & Flexible Roller (Most Powerful & Corded)
product_meta.description:
Emjoi Micro-Pedi 3D Power with SoftFlex Roller 

 The Emjoi° 3D Micro-Pedi Power is a ground breaking device with multi-movement technology created to smooth dry, rough and calloused skin on the feet and heels. 

 The revolutionary patented flex roller, made with microscopic mineral particles, flexes with the skin and pulverizes dead skin in seconds. 

 Spinning at 360°, an amazing 30 times per second, and oscillates laterally at 20 times per second this ingenious design gently and effectively buffs hard, jagged skin on the soles and heels in an instant. This amazing tool gives professional results right at home. 

 

This Emjoi NEW technology removes callous twice more efficiently than any previous callous removers Innovative device takes the chore out of smoothing skin on the feet and heels Revolutionary flex porous rollers, made with microscopic mineral particles, flexes with the skin for more comfort Spinning at 360°, an amazing 30 times per second, and oscillates laterally at 20 times per second this ingenious design gently and effectively buffs hard, jagged skin on the soles and heels in an instant The Flex roller is available in 4 versions to suit all foot care needs Gentle/Sensitive, Normal/Classic, Extra and Xtreme Coarse Safer and more effective than metal scrapers, which uses blades to cut the skin More effective than competitors products Ergonomically designed handle Professional salon results at home Electrically-operated - (Corded)
feature_bullets: Spinning at 360°, an amazing 30 times per second, and oscillates laterally at 20 times per second this ingenious design gently and effectively buffs hard, jagged skin on the soles and heels in an instant.
Patented Soft & Flexible roller, made with microscopic mineral particles, flexes with the skin and pulverizes dead skin in seconds.
The Emjoi 3D Micro-Pedi Power is a ground breaking device with multi-movement technology created to smooth dry, rough and calloused skin on the feet and heels.
